# Initialization

```{r}
library(modulr)
```

# Definition

```{r}
"unisis/dwh/raw/table" %requires% list("unisis/dwh/table") %provides%
  function(table) {
    get_all <- function() {
      subset(table$get_all(), grepl("^RAW", TABLE_NAME))
      }  
    get <- function(raw_table_name) {
      table$get(paste0("RAW", raw_table_name))
      }
    list(
      get_all = get_all,
      get = get
      )
    }
```
